description:
From the collection inspired by the spectacular freeski film “La Liste” featuring MAMMUT Pro Team Athlete Jérémie Heitz. The La Liste Pro Bib Pants are casual hardshell pants with a detachable bib. The robust and waterproof 3-layer GORE-TEX® Pro material guarantees durable weather protection combined with outstanding breathability. The detachable bib includes a
pocket for our Barryvox® avalanche transceiver.
name: Mammut La Liste Pro HS Bib Pants, Reg - Mens
